title: Help
body: The blackscreen after champ select is back i got leave buster 20 mins woo

replies.body: Black screen issues in champion select are commonly due to network issue failing to connect to the server.  Go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for a list of troubleshooting instructions to resolve this.  Let me know if you have any questions.
